syslog_addr.description:
syslog listening address in form `<protocol>://<host>:<port>`
where `<protocol>` can be `tcp`, `udp` or `ssl`

syslog_pem.description: path to PEM file is mandatory if syslog address is ssl

ui_addr.description:
web server listening address in form `<protocol>://<host>:<port>`
where `<protocol>` can be `http` or `https`

ui_pem.description: path to PEM file is mandatory if ui address is https

db_low_size.description: number of messages kept in database after database cleanup

db_high_size.description: number of messages that will trigger database cleanup

db_enable_archive.description:
should messages, deleted during database cleanup, be kept in
archive files
